content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (x)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (x1)
- Boiler at position (y1)
- Offshore Pump at position (z1)

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (x2)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x3) and a Furnace at position (y2)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x4) and a Furnace at position (y3)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x5) and a Furnace at position (y4)

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x6) and a Furnace at position (y5)
- Assembling Machine at position (z2) and Inserter at position (a1) that puts into the Assembling Machine
- Beltgroup at position (b1) that connects the Furnace at position (y5) to the Assembling Machine at position (z2)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors with Incorrect API Usage
- Double-check the API documentation to ensure correct function calls and parameter usage.

### Errors with Misplaced Objects
- Verify the intended position for object placement is correct and unoccupied before placing objects.
